headline: Assurant Supports Southern California Customers, Employees, and Communities Impacted by Wildfires
summary: ATLANTA, January 27, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a leading global business services company that supports, protects, and connects major consumer purchases, has opened mobile claims support sites for Southern California policyholders affected by the devastating wildfires across the region. In addition to being able to quickly and easily file claims online or via phone, now policyholders can file claims at Assurant mobile claims sites in Burbank and Santa Monica.
